definition: arranged like rays or radii, pneumatic tire that has radial-ply casing
details:
adjective
- arranged like rays or radii
= synonyms: radiate
- issuing in rays from a common center
- relating to or moving along or having the direction of a radius
= example: relating to or moving along or having the direction of a radius
- relating to or near the radius
= example: relating to or near the radius
noun
- pneumatic tire that has radial-ply casing
= synonyms: radial tire, radial-ply tire
